path: Referenced Material/PDF Library/Vendor/Evertz/Evertz Bulletins/Production Systems Engineering Bulletin- PROD EXE Upgrade-COMPLETE 12-14-20.pdf
text: Production Systems Engineering Bulletin- PROD EXE Upgrade 12/14/20 Monday- 12/14/20 This evening we completed the last set of upgrades to the PROD-EXE NCS Frame Controllers. Same as the upgrade we did last week on ACQ, this upgrade was done to fully resolve an outstanding EXE Frame Controller software bug, which was related to the November 16th Outage that we had across the IP Control Rooms. Please be aware of any odd reports from the CRs and Operations, let us know if anything pops up. Trevor Bascomb NBCUniversal Manager, Production Systems Engineering
